uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player
Class Marquee

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.Marquee

public final class Marquee
extends java.lang.Object

Builder for a Marquee.

Use like this, with a static import of marquee(): 

   marquee()
     .opacity(200)
     .position(libvlc_marquee_position_e.bottom)
     .colour(Color.white)
     .timeout(5000)
     .text("vlcj is just great")
     .size(20)
     .enable()
     .apply(mediaPlayer)
   ;
